summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5897 for the improvement of The Alley between Block 6, Hillman's Lake Front Addition, Division No. 3, and Block 1, Hillman's Lake Front Addition, Division No. 4, being the alley between North 71st Street and North 72nd Street, from Dayton Avenue to Greenwood Avenue; and certain other alleys and streets; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77879, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
